name: Little Dice
description:
How to Play

Press TAB to manipulate the abilities into different slots. 

Abilities can be dragged and dropped.

Use E and Q to rotate the dice.

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to use the ability on the corresponding side of the dice.

Fullscreen Reccomended!

KNOWN BUGS: tools are offset when hitting TAB, but just by a little bit. please try and reset them when they do this to get the best experience.

Screenshots About

Made in just 48 hours for the  GMTK Game Jam 2022!
